title: Problem about Starting up ...
body: Well , I was starting up League of Legends and 1-2 minutes later it show me the Userkernel , After that it disappeared and it popped up  LoLLauncher , But it didn't do anything is just appeared there . Please can someone help me with this issue. I'm running as Mac OS X

replies.body:
There may be an issue with the patcher itself which is preventing itself from launching or loading correctly.  Make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-mac) which should resolve this issue and get you into the client normally.

Reply back if you are still not able to!
I really appreciate your help sir :) It work now ... Thank you so much .
